extension.description: [COLOR gold]The Future Of Home Entertainment[/COLOR][CR]Kodi Repository for [COLOR steelblue]BoongoTV[/COLOR][CR][COLOR gold][B]ElectricalForce[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR white]Repo[/COLOR] allows you to install the BoongoTV WIZARD where you can get access to the latest BoongoTV Custom Builds and more.

Six is a Python 2 and 3 compatibility library. It provides utility functions for smoothing over the differences between the Python versions with the goal of writing Python code that is compatible on both Python versions. See the documentation for more information on what is provided.

addon.name: Extuary
addon.provider-name: phil65, Piers, SchisM, MR Blamo, Slamious

extension.summary: Estuary skin by phil65 and Piers. (Kodi's default skin)
extension.description: Estuary is the default skin for Kodi 17.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
extension.disclaimer: Estuary is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
extension.license: CC BY-SA 4.0, GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2.0

extension.description: Confluence is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.

extension.description: Diggz MP3 Streams Kodi 19 conversion by Slam
extension.news: 2021.0.6 - Fixed issue with hanging when skipping tracks. 2021.0.4 - Fixed Settings, 2021.0.3 - Bugfixes. Enjoy!

v0.0.5 - Fixed myFavourites. v0.0.4 - fixed an error loading certain lists. v0.0.3 - Major upgrade!!! Fixed missing links, added Search, added Favourites, added Recently Played, added a link checker to prevent crashing on certain dead links v0.0.1 - Kodi 19

extension.summary: Channels and playlists organised by categories using YouTube only.
extension.description: Xtasy D is a mix bag of one click playlists for all!

extension.description: Xonfluence is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).
Xonfluence is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).
Xonfluence is een MOD van Confluence om een grotere aanpassingsmogelijkheid te geven ten opzichten van de standaard skin (gebaseerd op Mudislander's CCM).
